Shadow B will extend further in the direction of the light, becoming even longer.
Shadow C will stretch out, becoming wider and longer.
Shadow D, already stretched by a distant light, will become even longer and more distorted.
Summarizing the changes: Shadows A, B, C, and D will change in both position and size, becoming longer and more elongated as the light source moves to the back right.
